DataElement.preferredName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 Clinical Regional Lymph Node N Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for the leiomyosarcoma and endometrial stromal sarcoma based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma Clinical N Stage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A malignant mesenchymal tumor arising from the wall of the uterine corpus (uterine body).  The most representative examples are leiomyosarcoma and endometrial stromal sarcoma. -- 2004__Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation. The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant mesenchymal tumor arising from the wall of the uterine corpus (uterine body).  The most representative examples are leiomyosarcoma and endometrial stromal sarcoma. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A malignant mesenchymal neoplasm arising from the wall of the uterine corpus (uterine body).  The most representative examples are leiomyosarcoma and endometrial stromal sarcoma.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:One criteria of the TMN staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CRF standard harmonization. Released per final community approval. mc 5/7/12

ValueDomain.preferredName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 N Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A finding about one or more characteristics of leiomyosarcoma and endometrial stromal sarcoma, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system._A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement._The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pN0 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pN0 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pN0 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: No regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pN1 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pN1 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pN1 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pNX TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pNX TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Leiomyosarcoma and Endometrial Stromal Sarcoma pNX TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)
